image.description: Any R object that can be coerced to a raster object

x.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying raster x-locations

y.description: A numeric vector, unit object, or a character vector of valuescontaining a "b" combined with a numeric value specifyingraster y-locations

width.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying raster widths

height.description: A numeric vector or unit object specifying raster heights

just.description: A string specifying the justification of text relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default unitsto use if \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height}are only given as numerics or numeric vectors

interpolate.description: A logical value indicating whether to linearlyinterpolate the image

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
